contentrichtext.text: '''The Guns of Navarone''' or '''Navarone''' can refer to: * [[The Guns of Navarone (novel)|''The Guns of Navarone'' (novel)]], a 1957 novel by Alistair MacLean, set during World War II * [[The Guns of Navarone (film)|''The Guns of Navarone'' (film)]], a 1961 film based on the novel, starring Gregory Peck, David Niven, and Anthony Quinn ** "The Guns of Navarone", the film's theme song, a hit for the Jamaican first-wave ska group [[The Skatalites]] and later covered by The Specials * ''[[Force 10 From Navarone]]'', a 1968 novel by Alistair MacLean, sequel to ''The Guns of Navarone'' * [[Force 10 from Navarone (film)|''Force 10 from Navarone'' (film)]], released in 1978 and loosely based on the 1968 novel by Alistair MacLean. * [[Navarone (video game)|''Navarone'' (video game)]], an arcade video game released by Namco in 1980, loosely inspired by the film * [[Navarone (band)]], a Dutch rock band == See also == {{Disambiguation}}
